Record.ClassificationPath: Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Skin Diseases, Papulosquamous/Pityriasis/Pityriasis Rubra Pilaris
Record.Description: A chronic skin disease characterized by small follicular papules, disseminated reddish-brown scaly patches, and often, palmoplantar hyperkeratosis. The papules are about the size of a pin and topped by a horny plug.
